patterns: How do i find my schedule?
How do i locate my schedule?
Where can i see my schedule?
responses: You can easily find your schedule by logging into Moodle and navigating to the 'Schedule' section. If you need further assistance, please let me know.

responses: LinkedIn Learning is an American online learning platform available for all students at LCIT. It provides video courses taught by industry experts in software, creative, and business skills. Click [here](https://adfs.lcaat.ca/adfs/ls/?SAMLRequest=fZJLU8IwFIX3%2FopO9n0QUDRDy5SiI6NghcqCDRPaUDKkCc1NW%2FXXW3mMujGLTDJzz7nnfslg%2BF4Iq2YauJI%2B6jgesphMVcZl7qO35MG%2BRcPgagC0EPhAwsrs5JyVFQNjjduNS2qOyp0xByCuS7MtOCKl1DgpPd5cAS6yHpRO2VHuoy0VwJA1GfvoebI2WV6U%2B%2B1NV%2FdV73q%2FV6rmeVnedXBbAjEF4DX7EQFUbCLBUGl8hD3csTuejb0EY9Lrkeuuc%2Bv1V8iKtTIqVWLE5WmWSkuiKHAgkhYMiEnJIpw%2BE%2Bx4ZHMqAvKYJLEdvywSZC0vTPA3k5aSBHKi8L%2FX4dwYBSdo5JhY%2F3b436AdmOlvqCi4QG2axhFc7lmb0klV4QpGtWwTu%2BHoPjyv%2FIOez%2F1o1bw%2BTrvR50jUOc%2FKeOnN1zP81GyibLnj%2BcD9HS24vO6szTIZx0rw9MMKhVBNpBk1LXyjK4bc4Kz7%2Bw%2BCLw%3D%3D) to get access.
